Advent Delayed Because Work Not Done for the Wicked--As in the days that were before the Flood, the impenitent see no cause for alarm. They 


                                 -276- 

eat, they drink, they marry and are given in marriage. The event has been long foretold, but time has passed on, and many distinctly say, "My Lord delayeth His coming." It is because the work has not been done for the wicked that time delays.
